name: Eagle Valley Golf Course
description: Eagle Valley Golf Course, located in the foothills of spacious Carson City, NV, just minutes from scenic Lake Tahoe, Virginia City, Reno and the beautiful Carson Valley! Here at Eagle Valley, we offer two of the region’s top 18-hole course for players to pick from. Our Eagle Valley East course features a user-friendly layout, great for both walking and riding. Meanwhile, our Eagle Valley West is a desert links-style course that challenges the best of golfers. Regardless of what course you play, you will find that Eagle Valley Golf provides a high quality golfing experience!
designer: Jack Miller & Homer Flint (West) / Rocky Roquemore (East)

faqs.question: What’s included in Eagle Valley golf group packages?
faqs.answer: Lodging, guaranteed tee times at Eagle Valley (East/West), carts, and concierge planning. Add transportation, dining, and multi-course options.

faqs.question: How much do Eagle Valley group packages cost?
faqs.answer: Typical range is $199–$499 per golfer depending on season, lodging, and group size.

faqs.question: Do you organize corporate or tournament groups?
faqs.answer: Yes—room blocks, tee-time blocks, tournament setup, and transportation for corporate and leisure groups.

meta.title: Eagle Valley Golf | Carson City Golf Groups & Stay and Play

tips.title: Golf The High Sierra
tips.content: Book your next group golf trip with us!

pointOfView: Great on the budget, and located a short 30 minutes from Reno, this facility has plenty to offer in two very distinct courses. This facility is one of the few in the area with 36 holes on the same property, and for this reason is a great choice to get in two rounds on the same day. We suggest starting with the East Course with its more traditional layout and fewer challenges. The West Course flashes a lot of personality with several holes up in the foothills, dog legs, canyons to carry and can be a good challenge for most golfers. Wedge this course into the middle of 3 or 4 days of golf and the price will help get your budget where you need it to be.
contentParagraphs: Book Eagle Valley in Carson City with golf groups, tee times, and stay & play packages. Expert planning for buddies, corporate, and tournaments.

featuredHole.title: West Course — Hole #14
featuredHole.description: A challenging par 4 with the Carson Range providing a dramatic mountain backdrop. The elevated green demands a precise approach — come up short and you're chipping uphill.

testimonials.quote: We drove up from the Bay Area specifically to play Eagle Valley Golf Course. Absolutely worth it. The Carson Valley, NV mountain backdrop on every hole is something special. GTHS arranged preferred tee times that worked perfectly for our group.
testimonials.author: Patrick S.

testimonials.quote: Eagle Valley Golf Course was the highlight of our Carson Valley, NV golf trip. Fairways were immaculate, pace of play was great, and the staff treated our group like VIPs. Golf the High Sierra nailed the tee time spacing for us.
testimonials.author: Sean A.

testimonials.quote: We've done golf trips all over the West, and Eagle Valley Golf Course is now a permanent stop. The condition was pristine, greens rolled true, and the mountain views are unmatched. GTHS set up our tee times perfectly.
testimonials.author: Greg S.
